nodes.text: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 21

Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 21 is the twenty-first issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. The issue was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli, and published on September 12, 2018 by Marvel Comics.
DARTH VADER returns to the place of his birth as he seeks the path to his destiny. Echoes from the past reach out to him — both from his own, and from the dark history of the SITH.
